title: Denial Management Dashboard UI
description:
Create Denial Tracking Dashboard with Analytics, Appeal Management, and Trend Reporting

Build a comprehensive dashboard for monitoring claim denials, managing appeals, and analyzing denial trends across time periods and categories.

Technical Implementation:

**Backend Architecture:**
- REST API Endpoints:
  - GET /api/denials?status={status}&dateRange={range}&page={page} - List denials with filtering
  - GET /api/denials/:id - Denial details
  - POST /api/denials/:id/appeal - Submit appeal with supporting documents
  - PUT /api/denials/:id/status - Update denial/appeal status
  - GET /api/analytics/denials - Aggregate metrics and trends
  - GET /api/analytics/trends?groupBy={dimension}&period={period} - Trend analysis

**Data Model:**
- Denial entity: id, claimId, denialCode, denialReason, denialDate, amount, status, appealDeadline, payerId
- Appeal entity: id, denialId, submittedDate, documents, notes, status, resolution, resolvedDate
- DenialCode lookup: code, category, description, appealSuccess rate

**Database:**
- Indexed queries on denialDate, status, denialCode for fast filtering
- Materialized views for analytics aggregations (daily denial counts, category rollups)
- Partitioning on denialDate for large historical datasets

**Frontend Components:**
- DashboardOverview: KPI cards (total denials, appeal rate, recovery amount, avg resolution time)
- DenialsList: Sortable/filterable table with pagination, export to CSV
- DenialDetails: Modal/page with full claim context and appeal history
- AppealForm: Multi-step form with document upload and validation
- AnalyticsCharts: 
  - Time series chart (denial volume over time)
  - Category breakdown (pie/bar chart by denial reason)
  - Trend analysis (week-over-week, month-over-month comparisons)
  - Top denial codes table
- FilterPanel: Date range picker, status filters, payer filters, denial code filters

**State Management:**
- React Query/SWR for server state caching and invalidation
- Local filters state with URL sync for shareable dashboard views
- Optimistic updates for status changes

**Analytics Engine:**
- Time-based aggregations: daily, weekly, monthly groupings
- Dimensional analysis: by denial code, payer, claim type, provider
- Calculated metrics: appeal success rate, average days to resolution, recovery percentage
- Comparative analysis: current period vs previous period

**File Handling:**
- Appeal document upload: Support PDF, images (max 10MB per file)
- Cloud storage integration (S3/Azure Blob) with signed URLs
- Document preview capability

**Performance:**
- Redis caching for analytics queries (15-minute TTL)
- Lazy loading for large denial lists (virtual scrolling)
- Background jobs for metrics recalculation
- Database query optimization with proper indexes

**Security:**
- Role-based access: View denials, Submit appeals, Manage appeals
- Audit logging for all appeal actions
- PHI/PII data encryption at rest and in transit

**Edge Cases:**
- Handle missing denial codes gracefully
- Display appeal deadline warnings (< 7 days)
- Empty states for new users/date ranges with no data
- Handle concurrent appeal submissions
- Timeout handling for long-running analytics queries
